alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 06 at 2:55AM CDT until October 07 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 degrees expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas near and west of Highway 281 have the highest chance to see a hard freeze with temperatures below 28 degrees.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
